## Type of Change

- [ ] Documentation (non-normative)

## Checklist
- [ ] I have read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My changes follow the specification style
- [ ] I have run validation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md (if normative change)
- [ ] No vendor mentions (grep for "Workrush", "Human-work", "Airprint")
